attributes.action: Allow driving tests and lessons to continue in the COVID-19 pandemic lockdown.
attributes.additional_details:
Allow all driving tests a d lessons yo go ahead in the COVID-19 lockdown. Manufacturing and trades work is still going ahead and running more or less as normal so why shouldn’t driving tests and lessons? 
Learner driving cars are completely COVID secure and following rules such as having windows down masks worn and hands sanitised- it’s safe.
There are young drivers itching to gain freedom of driving who keep getting denied the fact due to endless lockdowns and cancellations.
attributes.background: So many young people have had endless cancelled driving lessons due to lockdown, myself included having three cancelled. Allow driving tests to continue in lockdown.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Exempt driving tests and lessons from COVID-19 restrictions
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557462
